name: Kamer Promegranate Molasses
description: Pomegranate molasses is a syrupy concentrate that is sweet and tart and as delicious as it sounds. It’s flavourful and adds a wonderful tangy bite to many types of dishes. It can be used as a glaze, in salad dressings, or drizzled over veggies. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
